snippet: Edward J. Snowden submitted an application that seemed aimed at insulating President Vladimir V. Putin from United States pressure and blame.
abstract: Edward J Snowden formally requests temporary asylum in Russia, submitting application that seems aimed at insulating Pres Vladimir V Putin from United States pressure and blame.
lead_paragraph: Edward J. Snowden submitted an application that seemed aimed at insulating President Vladimir V. Putin from United States pressure and blame.

headline.main: Leaker Files for Asylum to Remain in Russia
headline.print_headline: Leaker Files For Asylum To Remain In Russia
